content.rendered: The 2021 limited edition bottle design of Hibiki Harmony pays tribute to the Ryusui-Hyakka (One-Hundred Flowers and Flowing Water). Often featured in Japanese traditional art as a ceremonial design, it celebrates the harmony of the cyclical passage of time symbolized through the ever-changing flow of water and the blossoms of Japanese seasons.
